message.body: Hey! So I'm applying to jobs right now, and I know we haven't decided on my title/all my responsibilities at Bonnie yet, but would it be okay if I listed myself as maybe a project manager, or some kind of managerial position? I know you wanted my role to shift towards that eventually right?
absolutely, or some kind of marketing title
Okay great, thank you! For lack of time/laziness I will just say manager for the time being and then come up with something more specific later. Hope I see you soon btw!
